body.name: Bedsure Full Size Sheets Grey - Soft Sheets for Full Size Bed, 4 Pieces Hotel Luxury Full Size Sheet Sets, Easy Care Polyester Microfiber Cooling Bed Sheet Set
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Thoughtful Design: The ruched hem on the pillowcase and top of the flat sheet elevates the elegance of these full size sheet sets. Available in multiple solid colors, Bedsure sheet & pillowcase sets can easily transform any bedroom into a stylish sleep paradise.

Ultra Soft: Featuring premium polyester microfiber fabric brushed on both sides, these Bedsure full bed sheets deliver exceptional softness for restful sleep all year round. Its smooth and breathable fabric provides maximum comfort without crinkling noise.

Enhanced Sturdiness: The premium plain weave adds extra sturdiness and enhanced durability to the 100% polyester microfiber fabric, ensuring the longevity of these Bedsure sheets and keeping them from shrinking and wrinkling. The unique dyeing technique brings out the colors and prevents them from fading.
Skin Safe: This sheet set is Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX certified for meeting the highest testing criteria for harmful chemicals and has been found harmless for humans.
What You Get: This machine washable full sheet set comes with 2 pillowcases (20" x 30"), 1 flat sheet (81" x 96") and 1 fitted sheet (54" x 75").

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bedsure Queen Sheets - An Oasis of Comfort and Luxury!
reviews.reviewText: The Bedsure Queen Sheets in grey have brought an unmatched level of comfort and luxury to my bedroom, and they unquestionably deserve a 5-star review. This hotel-quality sheet set has transformed my sleep experience, and here's why it's truly exceptional:Soft and Luxurious: The standout feature of these sheets is their remarkable softness. They feel like a dream against my skin, providing a luxurious and cozy surface for a restful night's sleep.Hotel Luxury: The term "hotel luxury" isn't an exaggeration. These sheets exude a level of opulence that rivals the finest hotel linens. They've elevated the comfort of my own bed to that of a 5-star hotel.Cooling Microfiber: The microfiber material not only feels heavenly but also keeps me cool and comfortable throughout the night. It's the perfect choice for a refreshing sleep, especially during warmer seasons.4-Piece Set: This set includes everything I need for a complete bed makeover - a fitted sheet, a flat sheet, and two pillowcases. It's a convenient and cost-effective solution for enhancing my bedding.Easy Care: Maintaining these sheets is a breeze. They're machine washable and maintain their softness and color even after multiple washes, ensuring long-lasting use.Elegant Grey: The grey color adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to my bedroom decor. It's a versatile shade that complements various interior styles.Perfect Fit: The fitted sheet features deep pockets and elastic all around, ensuring a snug and secure fit on my queen-sized mattress. It stays in place without any annoying slipping or sliding. the Bedsure Queen Sheets in grey have exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Their softness, hotel-quality luxury, cooling microfiber, complete 4-piece set, easy care, elegant color, and perfect fit make them a top-tier choice for those seeking the ultimate in bedding comfort and style. They have undoubtedly earned their 5-star rating and my wholehearted recommendation. If you're looking to transform your bedroom into an oasis of comfort and luxury, don't hesitate to try these sheets. It's a small investment with significant potential to enhance your sleep quality and elevate the ambiance of your sleep sanctuary!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good basic sheets!
reviews.reviewText: I’ll try to be as quick as possible. We have an adjustable base so our old sheets always came off and made us really hot. We ended up getting sheet stays and these sheets.In summary, we love these!Not in summary: These are MUCH cooler (as in, they keep us cool while sleeping) and they are kinda slick. Almost like silk but not. They are strong. Easy to clean. And we love the texture.The only problem was the non-fitted sheet. It never stayed tucked into the bed, even by the feet. We would wake up in the AM and most of it would be hanging off my side of the bed. It became a hassle to try and keep it on every morning so we stopped using it. Which is okay because we always sleep on top of the non-fitted sheet anyway.Other than that, these sheets are great! Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand. Their products are really thread count because it helps to make really so on the sheets and the pillows. But more Ryan and I quality still be comfortable cozy and a nature for the sheets. All in all I highly recommend I have a full size bed and the sheets fit pretty well my mattress is a little bit taller than some mattresses because it's a pillow top cover and for that reason the sheet doesn't quite tuck in on this but it does have plenty of space I can talk that in and have a little extra so I would overall recommend this product and I think the color is great and the softness is great and it works really well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color is off, but still good
reviews.reviewText: Very soft sheets, good quality, great price. My only complaint is that the color is much different than I expected. The first picture is what is shown online. The second picture is the actual color that I received. This color won't match my decor, but I will keep them as a backup because they are still very nice sheets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was worried about the quality of these very inexpensive sheet. Well they fit my adjustable bed mattress great. They stay on very well and are not stressed tight when mattress is moved up and down during the day. Others slip off the corners. I love the comfort and will buy more next payday!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got these as a backup
reviews.reviewText: Got a new full size bed and didn’t have any sheets that size so when I realized I needed a set for backup when the main ones needed to be washed I went to order more and they were no longer available. Boy was I glad about that because the ones I had first gotten were horrible quality. So I found these. So many to choose from out there that it came down to color and price. These are great! I really wanted the taupe color but it was almost $10 more expensive. So I went with the turquoise. Which I love but it is so close to the same color as my comforter that I have trouble telling if I have ahold of the sheet. Anyway, these look super luxurious. They are shiny and have a pretty little crinkle trim on them. They aren’t are soft as they look which is actually a good thing. They almost look like silk and they’d be sliding everywhere if they were. They are very soft. They are good quality and there are TONS of colors to choose from. When I realized I needed a backup for my backup sheets I went back to these and the taupe were the same price this time. So I now have 2 sets of these. I’m very pleased with the comfort and quality of these…especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These sheets are amazing! I have a thick pillow top mattress and these sheets went on with ease and no struggling. The flat sheet is actually long enough on the sides and bottom to actually tuck in so your bed looks neat. I have Coop pillows which are thick and i struggle with pillows cases, these pillows cases slid right on and have the nice little flat inside so your pillow is completely covered. Super soft and comfortable. I have 3 pairs and will most definitely be buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable & Soft but...
reviews.reviewText: I like this set. It is soft, the color is great, and the small design brings it up a notch! But 2 things I would not buy this for daily use: 1) it is too light & and thin so the sheets roll over you when you sleep - especially with hubs next to me 2) a Queen only comes with 2 pillow cases (affordable part) - I give a solid 3.5⭐ good bargain!
I needed extra sheets for my parent’s beds. They had to have deep pockets and feel nice. These sheets are awesome. Light weight but not too silky and slippery.
El color es muy bueno y están demasiado cómodos, aunque como tengo gatos siempre está llena de pelos, pero valen completamente la pena.
I like that they’re good quality good colour but the next day after purchasing they went up $30 in price

Wrinkle free, easy to wash, followed instructions to wash with cold water and tumble dry on low and had no issues. Goes perfectly with my daughters comforter set. I’ve only washed it once so I hope it holds up for a long time.

I ordered these sheets because they’re were inexpensive and I didn’t have much left to spend after replacing my double bed with a king. They do the job & came in brand new condition. You can tell they’re cheap though. They’re a bit thin & really nothing special, but they are soft. For the price they do the job. I will likely replace them with higher quality in the future but I really appreciate having a decent option for a lower budget. The colour is beautiful too.
